CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. It directly manipulates the Document Object Model (DOM) by creating and appending elements to the document body. If the data used in these operations is user-controlled and not properly sanitized, it could lead to XSS attacks where an attacker can inject malicious scripts.
